resources.string: Please enter a 4 digit PIN to Login. If this is your first time, please go ahead and create a PIN. You can also change your PIN here.
Have you ever lost or misplaced your wallet?
I don\'t know how it happened, but when I got home today I realized I didn\'t have my wallet with me. All my credit cards, and IDs were in there.
Use \"What Was in my Wallet?\" to take pictures of the contents of your wallet. Then look up the contents to cancel your drivers license, credit/debit cards, IDs, and everything else.
Important: Your pictures are stored securely on your mobile device ONLY, and can only be accessed using a 4 digit PIN.
